tweet: Awesome site displaying a full overview of places around the world accepting #IOTA:   https://t.co/EhSmNCuDrC  Looking forward to seeing the list grow, providing even more reasons to use #Trinity. If you've got a shop accepting IOTA, make sure to add it!

They say history repeats itself, but this is crazy..  Exactly one yr ago, #Tron surpassed #IOTA to claim 9th place.  Today, $TRX is just $28M away from taking the 9th spot from #BitcoinSV.   Will Jan 6 be another great day for #TRX?   Comment w/ emoji: 🚀 = YES 👎 = NO  $BCHSV

The #TangleBay is a place where anyone can list and discover places, bars, restaurants and much more which will accept #IOTA as a form of payment. Even more reasons to use the #Trinity Wallet.  https://t.co/cwCi9Qg7Sj  https://t.co/mGjJ8V3gOl

With electric vehicles and renewable energies becoming the new standard, vehicles will also be able to earn by participating in #P2P energy trading and thereby help stabilize energy grids that see the share of renewable energies rapidly increasing. #IOTA #DLT #Tangle #smartgrid  https://t.co/vJc0MIxvrx

#Ethereum, #TRON, and #Iota have outperformed most other #cryptocurrencies by 30-day Sharpe ratio; developed by Nobel laureate William F. Sharpe to evaluate the return of an investment relative to its risk. Meanwhile, #Bitcoin's performance was dismal.  https://t.co/r3wQbc8H0o
